creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: rectangular frontlet/pendant with birds edging a circle containing fish motifs; double-link chain with round flower-shaped links; cone shaped beads and bells on chains at bottom of frontlet
dimension: 20 1/8 x 7 3/8 x 3/4 in. (51.12 x 18.73 x 1.91 cm) ( including chain and pendants)
title: Frontlet on chain
